metadata.title: Convert JPG to PNG - Free Online Image Converter | Toolaze
metadata.description: Convert JPG/JPEG images to PNG format instantly. Batch convert up to 100 images. 100% free, private, no uploads required.

hero.desc: Convert JPG to PNG online for free. Simply drop your JPG images below to convert them to PNG in seconds.

intro.title: Why Convert JPG to PNG?
intro.content: PNG format supports transparency and lossless compression, making it ideal for logos, graphics, and images that require high quality. Our converter processes images locally in your browser, ensuring complete privacy.

scenes.title: Logo Conversion
scenes.desc: Convert logos from JPG to PNG to add transparency support.

scenes.title: Graphic Design
scenes.desc: Switch to PNG for lossless quality in design projects.

faq.a: Yes, PNG is a lossless format, so quality is fully preserved during conversion.
Yes, you can batch convert up to 100 images at once.

compare.others: Single file limits, Quality loss, Paid
